smsmessages.newcustomersmsmessage: Dear Customer, Welcome to Flamingo Family. Your Customer ID is {:custUniqueId:} - You need to use this ID for any transaction with Flamingo. Thanks - www.flamingotravels.co.in
smsmessages.newenquirysmsmessage: Dear Customer, Thanks for enquire us for your travels needs. Your Enquiry ID is {:enquiryId:}. You need to use this ID for any followup with Flamingo. Thanks - Sales Team
